content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play the violin, read, and eat chocolate.
That sounds like fun! I love to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I love all kinds of books, but I especially like historical fiction and mysteries.
Me too! I love learning about different time periods and solving mysteries.
I'm glad you like them too! What's your favorite historical fiction book?
I love the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon. It's a historical fiction series about a woman who travels back in time to 1743 Scotland.
I've heard of that series! It sounds really good. I'm going to have to check it out.
You should! It's a great series. What's your favorite mystery book?
I love the Agatha Christie books. She's such a great writer and her mysteries are always so well-written.
I agree! Agatha Christie is one of my favorite authors. I love her Poirot and Miss Marple books.
Me too! I also love her Tommy and Tuppence books.
They're so good! I'm glad you like Agatha Christie too. She's one of my favorites.
Me too! I'm going to have to read some more of her books.
You should! You won't be disappointed.
